title: QtCreator doesn't open on Mac
body:
Problem:

I need to install Qt Creator for my university course on my mac and it doesn't open. I've tried reinstalling different versions a lot of times but it gives me a Segmentation Fault everytime. Everything else is updated to the latest Version and i don't know what to try anymore. Any tips and solutions would be appreciated.

This is one of the error messages:

DebuggerItem \"/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/usr/bin/lldb\" ({8999bbd1-bcb9-4fd1-843a-47fec36eb8b6}) read from \"/Users/Samy/.config/QtProject/qtcreator/debuggers.xml\" dropped since the command is not executable."
zsh: segmentation fault  /Applications/Qt\ Creator.app/Contents/MacOS/Qt\ Creator

Here is the Report if I try opening the App:
